item.title: 道达尔能源公司为何与足球大亨达成 60 亿美元电力交易
item.description: 法国超级巨头表示，与捷克亿万富翁丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）在天然气和电池领域的合作使其能够在价值链的各个环节赚钱--无论是否有风吹草动【原文：French supermajor says gas and batteries linkup with Czech billionaire Daniel Kretinsky lets it make money right along the value chain – whether or not the wind is blowing】

item.title: 伍德股东支持西达拉收购要约
item.description: 这一表决意味着伍德现在可以动用 Sidara 根据交易条款承诺注入的 4.5 亿美元现金中的 2 亿美元。【原文：Vote means Wood can now access first $200 million of $450 million cash injection pledged by Sidara under terms of the deal】

item.title: 英国发布决定 "窃风 "纠纷的重要指南
item.description: 去年，有关风力涡流的争议不断，现有风力发电场的业主警告说，新项目造成的涡流损失威胁到了他们的经济可行性【原文：Disputes over wind wakes have flared in the last year, with owners of existing wind farms warning that wake losses from newcomer projects threaten their financial viability】

item.title: 得克萨斯州米德兰市充斥着石油繁荣萧条和宠儿的迹象
item.description: 一辆昂贵的皮卡车驶过德克萨斯州西部的这座城市，附近是一座废弃的办公大楼，上面有一幅泵用千斤顶的壁画。【原文：Expensive pickup trucks roll through this West Texas city near a derelict office tower sporting a mural of pump jacks, while a young woman is nervous that another oil downturn might be around the corner】
